name: MHH
description: All 3D Models,Textures, Music and Code made in-house. This game is meant to be about being diagnosed with diabetes, and the panic it can induce. This game focuses on resource management and making sure your glucose levels are both not too high, but also not too low. Too low and too high can have in-game debufs including, stroke, heart attack, and blindness. Just like in real life. All numbers of carbohydrates and insulin taken from real world values.
